Name: Dragonview
About the game: Warrior! Open your Eyes! This is the future of Gaming! Look. Before you leap. This isn't some corny collection of cardboard dungeons and dragons. It's a brilliant new vision of RPG Action Adventure. With Real-time 16 Meg 3D Scrolling like you've never seen. Plus an incredible Hero's Eye View of the danger. Through caves of fire and meadows of ice. Against brutal Demons and unforeseen evils. All the way to a showdown you'll never forget. Bring your bow, your sword, your magic and don't blink - or you're doomed!
